channel.title: vrara on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in vrara on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: Panelist & Organizer - Essentials of XR Product Development
item.description: The VRAR Association’s Product Design and Development (PDD) Community of Practice (COP) is bring series of webinars, First one is coming in this July, It will be hosted by Mr. Tejinder Jassal , and I will be co-speaker/panelist of this webinar, along with Mr. Aditya Bhatnagar and Mr. Raju Kandasamy Highlights Understanding XR technologies What it takes to build XR products and solutions How it is going from “nice to have” to “must have” choice in this COVID time?
